divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitiing on deck late evening, perhaps 11 pm or maybe later, not sure, as i was not wearing watch..i was seated with my sister when i looked up into sky and saw the orange bright light hovering over next cottage, and then directly over mine..We called our friend who also witnessed it..None of us have ever seen anything like this...it was silent, above treeline, below clouds...it slowed down a bit, would drop a few feet and move again towards next cottage...We watched this for 1-2 minutes, it may have been longer...but we did not get a picture of it...no engine heard...we were shocked at first...and am upset i do not have physical proof, other than 2 more witnesses..We lost sight of the object due to high trees in the next yard.
Summary: solid orange, bright circular with orange aura like halo around it..
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Lafontaine
There were 3 other sightings in Lafontaine on or around June 30th 2012
